message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but I can't go as low as $95.  Would you consider $105? It's a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $100 as the price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
